ygData.subject: Re: Supplies
ygData.msgSnippet: If you can, the easiest place to do pottery near Qeynos is Halas, because all the supplies are in the same zone.  Halas is not that far away, and the trip
ygData.messageBody:
If you can, the easiest place to do pottery near Qeynos is Halas, because
all the supplies are in the same zone. Halas is not that far away, and
the trip through Blackburrow is probably very safe since there are often
so many players there. That's my advice.


On Thu, 8 Jul 1999, Boyes, Damien wrote:

>
> Does anyone know where I can get potters supplies (clay, scrolls, etc.) in
> and around Queynos? Or does anyone have a comprehensive list of pottery
> merchants?
>
> Thanks
>
> Dekard
>
